text: Taiwan Stock Exchange (TWSE; ) is a financial institution which is located in Taipei 101, in Taipei, Taiwan. TWSE was established in 1961 and it started operating as a stock exchange on 9 February 1962. It is regulated by the Financial Supervisory Commission of Taiwan. Taiwan Stock Exchange broadcasts before-hour information from 7:40 to 8:40. Then it has normal trading sessions from 09:00 to 13:45 and a fixed price post-market sessions from 14:00 to 15:00 on all days of the week except Saturdays, Sundays and holidays. These holidays are declared by the exchange in advance.Market Hours, Taiwan Stock Exchange via Wikinvest ==References== Category:20th-century establishments in Taiwan Category:1961 establishments in Asia Category:Economy of Taiwan Category:Stock exchanges in Asia Category:Taipei
title: Taiwan Stock Exchange
